title: Dropping by with a forum time capsule

embed.description: Well boards are quickly closing in and we don't know how much time we have left but in this time that we do have we can make a post, post anything on this thread and leave it as a record as an archive for us to remember, think of this as a time capsule for us to fill before GD makes the transmission fully to boards, now this is just a little sentimental thing and you don't have to participate if you don't want to but this is really just a little collection to be archived eventually.

body: Time capsule of the old forums. It includes people you might not know if weren't around during the forums seeing most of these people didn't move to boards. Enjoy

replies.body:
Damn, I left a fair bit before that thread was made.

This post reminds me of how many morons there was on the OCE GD.

Molendo, Rav, anyone is ESP, SEKAI, fortunexhunter, HeartVine, molendo again, rav and Silver5aruman.

Lol, molendo still trash, still silver, GG, trashie could only get gold in preseason when nobody was trying, lmao.

hi, my friend, I understand your deep anger but please, let your anger out, I am only here to make friends and you are a good friend of mine, well you can be, anyway my friend, glad i could help - ur welcome
